dcterms:description: The WMT 15 translation tasks involve translation from English to German and Russian, focusing on the challenge of translating rare and unknown words using subword units.

dcterms:description: The dataset consists of parliamentary proceedings and web crawl data, which are used for training and evaluating machine translation models.
